title: U.S. Supreme Court tariff ruling will likely allow India to keep buying Russian oil
summary_full: India is unlikely to eliminate Russian oil imports and the U.S. may not have enough leverage to push New Delhi to do so, analysts say.
summary_public: India is unlikely to eliminate Russian oil imports and the U.S. may not have enough leverage to push New Delhi to do so, analysts say.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: India to keep buying Russian oil
